00029 template <typename T, int N, int C>
00030 class NestedIterator : public boost::iterator_facade<
00031     NestedIterator<T,N,C>,
00032     typename ArrayTraits<T,N,C>::Value,
00033     boost::random_access_traversal_tag,
00034     typename ArrayTraits<T,N,C>::Reference
00035     >
00036 {
00037 public:
00038     typedef typename ArrayTraits<T,N,C>::Value Value;
00039     typedef typename ArrayTraits<T,N,C>::Reference Reference;
00040     
00041     Reference operator[](int n) const {
00042         Reference r(_ref);
00043         r._data += n * _stride;
00044         return r;
00045     }
00046 
00047     Reference const & operator*() const { return _ref; }
00048 
00049     Reference const * operator->() { return &_ref; }
00050 
00051     NestedIterator() : _ref(Value()), _stride(0) {}
00052 
00053     NestedIterator(Reference const & ref, int stride) : _ref(ref), _stride(stride) {}
00054 
00055     NestedIterator(NestedIterator const & other) : _ref(other._ref), _stride(other._stride) {}
00056 
00057     template <typename T_, int C_>
00058     NestedIterator(NestedIterator<T_,N,C_> const & other) : _ref(other._ref), _stride(other._stride) {}
00059 
00060     NestedIterator & operator=(NestedIterator const & other) {
00061         if (&other != this) {
00062             _ref._data = other._ref._data;
00063             _ref._core = other._ref._core;
00064             _stride = other._stride;
00065         }
00066         return *this;
00067     }
00068 
00069     template <typename T_, int C_>
00070     NestedIterator & operator=(NestedIterator<T_,N,C_> const & other) {
00071         _ref._data = other._ref._data;
00072         _ref._core = other._ref._core;
00073         _stride = other._stride;
00074         return *this;
00075     }
00076 
00077 private:
00078 
00079     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00080 
00081     template <typename T_, int N_, int C_> friend class NestedIterator;
00082 
00083     Reference const & dereference() const { return _ref; }
00084 
00085     void increment() { _ref._data += _stride; }
00086     void decrement() { _ref._data -= _stride; }
00087     void advance(int n) { _ref._data += _stride * n; }
00088 
00089     template <typename T_, int C_>
00090     int distance_to(NestedIterator<T_,N,C_> const & other) const {
00091         return std::distance(_ref._data, other._ref._data) / _stride; 
00092     }
00093 
00094     template <typename T_, int C_>
00095     bool equal(NestedIterator<T_,N,C_> const & other) const {
00096         return _ref._data == other._ref._data;
00097     }
00098 
00099     Reference _ref;
00100     int _stride;
00101 };
